name: Extreminator
description:
Extreminator is an old-school arcade-style top-down 2D shoot-em-up in which the player goes head-to-head with the dreaded Cosmonoptera insect armada. How many points can you score before being overwhelmed?

Controls:

  • WASD, arrows, gamepad, or joystick to move.
  • Space or gamepad button to shoot.

Features:

  • 3 waves of space bugs to blast, getting successively more difficult as you go
  • Seven types of Cosmonoptera, including three bosses
  • Three different power-ups
  • Hand-crafted pixel art
